deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0394 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
R Real TimeReal Time
T Bolus (a series of responses sent at the same time without use of batch formatting)Bolus (a series of responses sent at the same time without use of batch formatting)
B BatchBatch

name: ResponseModality
title: responseModality
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts identifying the timing and grouping of the response message(s).  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the Response Control Parameter (RCP) segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0394 (Response Modality)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

concept.display: Bolus (a series of responses sent at the same time without use of batch formatting)
